house_listing.house_description: This 2 level detached single family home built in 1970 has 4 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) , 2 car garage and approximately 2639 square feet of living area. Rooms include family room, living room, master bedroom. Features include view, private spa, fireplace, air conditioning.
house_listing.agent_name: A Gary Kent A Gary Kent

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Family Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
residential_listing_-_feature_details.view: Bay View, Ocean View, Panoramic View, View
